      boolean Setup.select(ModelCountry country)
      During Setup any country is select-able but only one can be selected at a time.
      boolean Reinforce.select(ModelCountry country)
      During Reinforce only one ModelCountry can be selected at once and that ModelCountry most be ruled by the current ModelPlayer as specified by GameController.getCurrentModelPlayer().
      abstract boolean ModelState.select(ModelCountry country)
      Determines whether or not the specified ModelCountry has been selected by this ModelState.
      boolean Fortify.select(ModelCountry country)
      During the Fortify state the current ModelPlayer can select one of their ModelCountrys then another provided that there is a path of friendly ModelCountrys between the two ModelCountry.
      boolean Attack.select(ModelCountry country)
      During Attack the current ModelPlayer can select any of their ModelCountrys and then a ModelCountry that is directly linked to the ModelPlayer that is ruled by an enemy ModelPlayer.
      private boolean Fortify.selectPrimary(ModelCountry country)
      Retrieves whether or not the specified ModelCountry could be selected as the Fortify's primary ModelCountry.
      private boolean Attack.selectPrimary(ModelCountry country)
      Retrieves whether or not the specified ModelCountry could be selected as the Attack's primary ModelCountry.
      private boolean Fortify.selectSecondary(ModelCountry country)
      Retrieves whether or not the specified ModelCountry could be selected as the Fortify's secondary ModelCountry.
      private boolean Attack.selectSecondary(ModelCountry country)
      Retrieves whether or not the specified ModelCountry could be selected as the Attack's secondary ModelCountry.
